Title: Authorizes the town of Copake to establish community preservation funds and to impose a real estate transfer tax with revenues to be deposited into the fund
Summary: Authorizes the town of Copake to establish community preservation funds and to impose a real estate transfer tax with revenues to be deposited into the community preservation fund; provides for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof.
LawCode: Add §64-l, Town L; add Art 31-J §§1450-a - 1450-o, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to authorizing the town of Copake to establish community preservation funds; to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the town of Copake to impose a real estate transfer tax with revenues therefrom to be deposited in said community preservation fund; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions of the tax law upon expiration thereof
